views.markdown:
v4.0.4 - Support latest WhatsApp update 2.19.50 - Fixed profiles directory in disk usage - Fixed UDID not found when restoring license on A12 devices - Fixed blacklisted contacts list not saving v4.0.0 - A new licensing system, you can now purchase a new license or restore your Cydia license by logging in into your Watusi account - Moved the profile photos location to the app documents directory so they are now organized in folders - Stalky will move the pictures to the new location when it's first launched after the update - Fetching saved user profile pictures should be much faster now - New Export/Import options available under Disk Usage section - Updates list and settings tables will now match the theme of the app - Fixed popup view controller when 3d touching on an update - Fixed the option to disable saving status updates - Removed contacts joined/deleted WhatsApp updates because they are not accurate - Better right to left language support - Better iPhone X compatibility - More bug fixes and improvements v3.1.12
- Support latest WhatsApp 2.18.100
v3.1.11
- Support latest WhatsApp update 2.18.90
v3.1.9
- Support latest WhatsApp update 2.18.51
v3.1.6
- Fixed stalky badges not showing on iOS 11
- Fixed updates table showing random user about changes
- Fixed update available alert conflict with Watusi

v3.1.5
- Added a temporary fix for in-app notifications on iPhone X


- Fix updates table showing random user picture delete/change


- Support iOS 11 jailbreak
- Fixed some crashes on iPad
v3.1.2
- Support latest WhatsApp update 2.18.20
v3.1.1
Fixed profile pictures toolbar not showing when a contact picture is displayed using Watusi's tap to open picture on latest WhatsApp 2.17.80
- Fixed saving profile and group updates on latest WhatsApp 2.17.71
- Fixed saving/sharing videos from updates table
- Support saving text statuses
- Added option to track when a contact joins WhatsApp or delete his account
v3.0.2
- Support latest WhatsApp update 2.17.51


v3.0
- Added support for status updates
- Re-wrote the updates table
- Added 3D touch support to the updates table
- Added an icon for each update type
- Added option to colorize the updates table
- Added picture date under count label on contact profile picture
- Added option to enable/disable items from auto add/download
- Improvements and bug fixes to the images gallery
- New layout for the Preferences page
- More changes that I don't even remember
Version 2.0.15:
- Fixed Stalky button not showing up on latest WhatsApp update 2.16.18
- Fixed Stalky button going on top of compose button some times on WhatsApp launch

Version 2.0.14:
- Fixed several crashes with latest WhatsApp update on 32bit devices
- Fixed saved pictures gallery crash when viewing a picture then scrolling and tapping another
- Pictures gallery will now show the time that your contact changed the picture and not the time it was saved on your device
Fixed a bug where WatusiTools would load on SpringBoard Fixed profile picture updates on latest WhatsApp update 2.16.8 - Fixed crash when sharing image from profile picture view Fixed images downloading on latest WhatsApp 2.12.17 Support latest WhatsApp update 2.12.14 Bug fixes and improvements - Re-wrote most of the update saving code
- Updates are now saved into a database
- Updates table should be much more smoothly
- More Auto-Download options (Wi-Fi, Wi-Fi and Cellular, Never)
- New gallery for saved pictures that support deleting images
- Fixed blacklisted contacts showing in updates table
- Fixed saved pictures/status from contact info view for contact with multiple phone numbers
- New Contacts Picker table which includes recent chats and will now show all numbers for a single contact
- Added filter button where you can filter updates to show all/status/picture/group updates
- Moved delete button is now on settings page
- Fixed profile picture view not showing the latest saved image of a contact before deleting picture
- Show Stalky Saved pictures and statuses buttons on group info page
- Fixed groups empty notifications
- Added option to check saved pictures for all contacts
- Fixed deleting profile picture still showing on profile
- Fixed Stalky header picture not updating when profile picture is changed/deleted
Version 1.2:
- Fixed update sorting issue for users with different local date format
- Fixed group updates not incrementing badge number
- Fixed badge on iOS 9 changing to square
- Added option to change notifications sound
- Added option to disable auto download of images
- Added option to blacklist a contact and stop receiving its updates
- Added option to check all saved profile pictures for a contact in WhatsApp Media folder. You can check it from 3 places: 1) From contact profile picture, 2) From contact info page, 3) By tapping or long pressing on update cell.
- Added option to check all statuses updates for a contact

Version 1.2.1:
- Prevent Latest WhatsApp 2.12.10 from deleting a contact saved pictures automatically when its changed/deleted"
- Lots of improvements to the updates table (more group updates)
- Added a section for selective updates where you can see only the updates of the selected contacts
- Added option to receive notifications for all/selected contacts updates
- More bug fixes and improvements
